pullrequest.title: We now require a literal call to project(~) before calling ign_configure_project(~)

content.raw: I was about to suggest that we give a build error if the numeric suffixes to the project name don't match the major version, but I know there's people who don't like that practice. I think it's more flexible if we don't explicitly require it, though it's a little more work to keep in sync.
